data.name: XChangesBatch
desc: this interface enables applying a set of changes in one batch transaction.
An object implementing this interface allows other interfaces to change its state locally. It will keep a list of pending changes until such changes are committed or canceled.
Only when they are explicitly committed will these changes take effect persistently or globally.

methods.name: commitChanges
desc: The exact action depends on the concrete service.

methods.name: getPendingChanges
desc: queries for any pending changes that can be committed.

methods.name: hasPendingChanges
desc: checks whether this object has any pending changes that can be committed.
